browseWeb.title: Browse the Web
browseWeb.description: Enter URLs and use navigation buttons (Back, Forward, Refresh, Stop).

travelThroughTime.title: Travel Through Time
travelThroughTime.description: Select a year from the dropdown to view websites from the past or future.

historyReimagined.title: History Reimagined
historyReimagined.description: AI reconstructs very old sites (pre-1996) and imagines future web experiences.

saveFavorites.title: Save Favorites
saveFavorites.description: Add sites and specific years to your Favorites bar for easy access.

exploreTimeNodes.title: Explore Time Nodes
exploreTimeNodes.description: Click the clock icon in the address bar to see available snapshots of the current site across time.

shareJourney.title: Share Your Journey
shareJourney.description: Use the Share button to generate a link to the exact page and year you're viewing.

chatWithRyo.title: Chat with Ryo
chatWithRyo.description: Type your message to chat with Ryo, generate code, or get help with syaOS.

createEditFiles.title: Create & Edit Files
createEditFiles.description: Ask Ryo to create HTML applets, edit documents, read files, or search the Applets Store.

controlApps.title: Control Apps
controlApps.description: Ask Ryo to launch or close apps, switch themes, or control iPod playback.

joinChatRooms.title: Join Chat Rooms
joinChatRooms.description: Connect with others in public chat rooms. Mention @ryo for AI responses.

pushToTalk.title: Push to Talk
pushToTalk.description: Hold Space or tap the microphone button to record and send voice messages.

nudgeDjMode.title: Nudge & DJ Mode
nudgeDjMode.description: Send ðŸ‘‹ nudge for context-aware tips. Ryo becomes a DJ when music is playing.

text.title: Text
text.description: Just start typing with plain text

richEditing.title: Rich Editing
richEditing.description: Type, copy, cut, paste, undo & redo your text with ease

formatting.title: Formatting
formatting.description: Bold, italic, underline, headings & alignment options

listsTasks.title: Lists & Tasks
listsTasks.description: Create bullet, numbered & check-box task lists

fileManagement.title: File Management
fileManagement.description: Create, open, save, and export files (HTML, MD, TXT)

voiceDictation.title: Voice Dictation
voiceDictation.description: Dictate text hands-free right into the document

slashCommands.title: Slash Commands
slashCommands.description: Type / for quick actions or let Ryo AI edit lines remotely

dialogs.enterImageName: Enter a name for your image
dialogs.discardChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes. Create new file anyway?

drawingTools.title: Drawing Tools
drawingTools.description: Use the toolbar on the left to select different drawing tools like pencil, brush, shapes, and more.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: Select colors from the palette below the tools to change your drawing color.

undo.title: Undo
undo.description: Press âŒ˜Z or use Edit > Undo to undo your last action.

saving.title: Saving
saving.description: Use File > Save to save your artwork, or File > Save As to save it with a new name.

patterns.title: Patterns
patterns.description: Choose from various patterns in the bottom palette to fill shapes and areas.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Apply invert, grayscale, brightness & more from the Filters menu.

takingPhoto.title: Taking a Photo
takingPhoto.description: Click the large red camera button to capture a single image.

quickSnaps.title: Quick Snaps
quickSnaps.description: Click the timer button (left of the camera button) to start a sequence of four photos taken one second apart.

applyingEffects.title: Applying Effects
applyingEffects.description: Click the 'Effects' button (right of the camera button) to open the effects panel and apply fun filters to your live camera view.

viewingPhotos.title: Viewing Photos
viewingPhotos.description: Click the photo stack button (far left) to show or hide the photo strip at the bottom, displaying all your saved photos.

downloadingPhotos.title: Downloading Photos
downloadingPhotos.description: Photos are automatically saved. Click on a photo in the photo strip to download it.

switchingCameras.title: Switching Cameras
switchingCameras.description: Use the 'View' menu in the menu bar to switch between available cameras if you have more than one connected.

desktopControls.title: Desktop Controls
desktopControls.description: Left-click to reveal, right-click to flag, double-click numbers to auto-reveal neighbors.

mobileControls.title: Mobile Controls
mobileControls.description: Tap to reveal, long-press to flag a mine.

gameRules.title: Game Rules
gameRules.description: Numbers show adjacent mines. Flag every mine and reveal all safe cells to win.

timerCounter.title: Timer & Counter
timerCounter.description: Top bar shows elapsed time and remaining unflagged mines.

restart.title: Restart
restart.description: Press the smiley face or choose Game â–¸ New to start a fresh board.

addVideo.title: Add Video
addVideo.description: Paste any YouTube URL to add to playlist

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Loop current video or entire playlist

playlist.title: Playlist
playlist.description: Manage and organize your video playlist

wheelNavigation.title: Wheel Navigation
wheelNavigation.description: Use the click wheel to browse menus and your music library.

playbackControls.title: Playback Controls
playbackControls.description: Play, pause, skip tracks, and control your current song.

lyricsPronunciation.title: Lyrics & Pronunciation
lyricsPronunciation.description: View synced lyrics with translations, furigana, romaji, and pinyin.

playbackModes.title: Playback Modes
playbackModes.description: Enable shuffle, repeat songs or playlists, and more.

displayFullscreen.title: Display & Fullscreen
displayFullscreen.description: Adjust backlight, themes, and switch to fullscreen video.

karaoke.name: Karaoke

addSearchSongs.title: Add & Search Songs
addSearchSongs.description: Search YouTube for songs, or paste a URL to add to your library.

instantTranslations.title: Instant Translations
instantTranslations.description: Instantly translate lyrics into multiple languages.

syncLyricsTiming.title: Sync Lyrics Timing
syncLyricsTiming.description: Use [ ] keys, mouse wheel, or drag up/down to adjust lyrics offset.

stylePronunciation.title: Style & Pronunciation
stylePronunciation.description: Change fonts, layouts, translations, and add furigana/romaji/pinyin.

syncedWithIpod.title: Synced with iPod
syncedWithIpod.description: Shares the same music library as iPod. Add songs in either app.

worksWithChats.title: Works with Chats
worksWithChats.description: Ask Ryo to play songs, control playback, or adjust settings via chat.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Space to play/pause, arrow keys to seek and change tracks.

synth.name: Synth

virtualKeyboard.title: Virtual Keyboard
virtualKeyboard.description: Play notes with on-screen keys or computer keyboard

controlsPanel.title: Controls Panel
controlsPanel.description: Toggle CONTROLS to tweak oscillators, envelope & effects

presets.description: Save, load & manage custom sound presets

waveform3d.title: 3D Waveform
waveform3d.description: Live animated waveform when controls panel is open

effects.title: Effects

keyboardControls.description: Use your physical keyboard for in-game input

fullscreenMode.title: Full-Screen Mode
fullscreenMode.description: Toggle View â–¸ Full Screen for an immersive display

aspectRatio.description: Switch between 4âˆ¶3 or widescreen to fit your monitor

basicCommands.title: Basic Commands
basicCommands.description: Use commands like ls, cd, cat, pwd, clear, and touch to navigate and manage files.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: Browse the same virtual file system as Finder with familiar Unix commands.

commandHistory.title: Command History
commandHistory.description: Press â†‘ / â†“ arrows to cycle through previous commands and re-run them quickly.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Type "ryo <prompt>" to chat with Ryo AI directly inside the terminal.

fileEditing.title: File Editing
fileEditing.description: Open documents in TextEdit (edit) or Vim-style editor (vim) right from the prompt.

terminalSounds.title: Terminal Sounds
terminalSounds.description: Distinct sounds for output, errors & AI replies. Toggle in View â–¸ Sounds.

appletStore.title: Applet Store
appletStore.description: Browse and install applets from the community. Open the Store menu to discover new apps.

createWithRyosChat.title: Create with syaOS Chat
createWithRyosChat.description: Ask syaOS Chat to create custom apps and applets for you. Share your ideas and get working apps instantly.

viewApplets.title: View Applets
viewApplets.description: Open and run applets saved from syaOS Chat or downloaded from the store.

shareApplets.title: Share Applets
shareApplets.description: Share your favorite applets with others using the Share Applet option in the File menu.

openFromFinder.description: Browse and open applets saved on your system using the File menu.

keepUpdated.description: Check for updates in the Store menu to get the latest versions of your installed applets.
